SELECT
bno ,title ,content ,atch_file_id ,userId ,viewCnt ,fix ,DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate
FROM tb_board
WHERE fix = '0'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND( TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') or CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') )
ORDER BY fix DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT
bno ,title ,userId ,viewCnt ,fix ,DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate
FROM tb_board
WHERE fix = '1'
ORDER BY bno DESC

SELECT COUNT(bno)
FROM tb_board
WHERE fix = '0'
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND( title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') or content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') )

SELECT
bno ,title ,content ,atch_file_id ,userId ,viewCnt ,fix ,DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate
FROM tb_board
WHERE bno = #{bno}

SELECT
bno, title
FROM tb_board
WHERE bno < #{bno}
ORDER BY bno DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
bno, title
FROM tb_board
WHERE bno > #{bno}
ORDER BY bno ASC
LIMIT 1
